content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here is some information on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Experts+onboarding\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"expert\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" advice and assistance requests for project evaluation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":12277,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1994e221-e340-4e94-93f0-60b030d5d737/1_fix.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1994e221-e340-4e94-93f0-60b030d5d737/1_fix.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"1_fix.png\",\"name\":\"1_fix.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1994e221-e340-4e94-93f0-60b030d5d737\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each request is assigned to an expert supervisor who shares the experience with new experts. D2+/D3 level specialists can step in to help and, most importantly, to learn.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The most experienced experts who have completed more than ten requests can become JSCC supervisors, a highly esteemed role in the company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supervisors and experts \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tgradually develop good organizational skills and network with active and enthusiastic drivers from different locations; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\teventually start to develop and promote new initiatives and JSCC projects;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tserve as members of the JSCC core team's strategic council;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tand even run global programs and processes.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thanks to the openness of the Competency Center, any team member, even from the smallest city working on a minor project, can begin to influence our entire immense practice and lead something on a global level in an international team of like-minded people.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Competency Center is one of our most important growth accelerators to move to the next level.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
